'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|landmass]] in {{bow}}.

==Background==
A frigid stretch of waters seemingly right out of the Arctic regions of [[Eora]], the Dead Floe is home to a cult of [[Rymrgand]], who relish its cold environment.

==Locations==
* [[Harbinger's Watch]]
title: The Dead Floe
